articles.title: United States GP: Lewis Hamilton downbeat after Mercedes upgrade fails to meet his expectations - Sky Sports
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton admitted he was "expecting a lot more" from Mercedes' upgrades at the US GP, after finishing fifth in qualifying behind the Ferraris and Red Bulls.
